abstract: Senate approves amendment requiring independent research program that will study impact of combat service on suicide rates and other mental health issues among soldiers and veterans; measure seeks to correct previously uncoordinated efforts to track this data by Dept of Veterans Affairs and Defense Dept.
lead_paragraph: Research into veterans’ suicide received a lift on Tuesday with Senate passage of a measure requiring an independent research program on the effects of combat service on suicide rates and other mental health issues among troops and veterans.

headline.main: Senate Approves Research Into Combat Effects on Mental Health
headline.print_headline: Senate Approves Research Into Combat Effects on Mental Health

snippet: Research into veterans’ suicide received a lift on Tuesday with Senate passage of a measure requiring an independent research program on the effects of combat service on suicide rates and other mental health issues among troops and veterans.
